Ukraine keeps pounding Russia's Kursk region with drones, Russian officials say
content: Kyiv launched over two dozen drones on Russia's Kursk region, damaging an oil depot. The attacks, reported by Russian officials, led to minor damage to residential buildings. Russia's defence ministry stated that 39 drones were destroyed across various regions overnight. Ukraine's drone attacks are said to be a response to Russia's ongoing bombing of Ukraine.
summary: Kyiv launched over two dozen drones on Russia's Kursk region, damaging an oil depot. The attacks, reported by Russian officials, led to minor damage to residential buildings. Russia's defence ministry stated that 39 drones were destroyed across various regions overnight. Ukraine's drone attacks are said to be a response to Russia's ongoing bombing of Ukraine.

Watch: Trump imitates Biden playing golf, offers '$1 million if ... '
content: During a rally in Minnesota, Donald Trump revealed he had offered Joe Biden $1 million for a golf game challenge. Trump mocked Biden's golf handicap claims, recalling Biden's appearance in a presidential debate. Trump also criticized Biden's fitness and running mate Kamala Harris. Biden declined the challenge, according to Trump.
summary: During a rally in Minnesota, Donald Trump revealed he had offered Joe Biden $1 million for a golf game challenge. Trump mocked Biden's golf handicap claims, recalling Biden's appearance in a presidential debate. Trump also criticized Biden's fitness and running mate Kamala Harris. Biden declined the challenge, according to Trump.

‘Biohazard’ on United Airlines flight: Crew vomiting, passengers ask for masks, flight diverted
content: A United Airlines flight from Houston to Boston was diverted to Washington DC due to a biohazard incident. A passenger became ill, causing crew members to vomit and passengers to request masks. The plane landed safely for a deep clean, and no medical assistance was needed for the 155 passengers and six crew members.
summary: A United Airlines flight from Houston to Boston was diverted to Washington DC due to a biohazard incident. A passenger became ill, causing crew members to vomit and passengers to request masks. The plane landed safely for a deep clean, and no medical assistance was needed for the 155 passengers and six crew members.

North Korea's Kim Jong Un inspects flooded areas near China border, KCNA says
content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un visited flooded areas near the China border after heavy rain affected around 5,000 people. The military successfully rescued 4,200 people using 10 planes. Kim praised the military's efforts but criticized officials for inadequate crisis preparation. The region was impacted by Tropical Storm Gaemi, causing landslides and flash floods.
summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un visited flooded areas near the China border after heavy rain affected around 5,000 people. The military successfully rescued 4,200 people using 10 planes. Kim praised the military's efforts but criticized officials for inadequate crisis preparation. The region was impacted by Tropical Storm Gaemi, causing landslides and flash floods.

title: US couple rescued after 36 hours lost at sea during Texas scuba dive
Mass shooting at Rochester's Maplewood Park leaves one dead, many injured in US
content: One person was killed and six others injured in a mass shooting at Maplewood Park, Rochester. The police responded promptly but have not apprehended any suspects yet. Authorities urge anyone with information to contact them as the investigation continues. The identity of the deceased is yet to be released pending family notification.
summary: One person was killed and six others injured in a mass shooting at Maplewood Park, Rochester. The police responded promptly but have not apprehended any suspects yet. Authorities urge anyone with information to contact them as the investigation continues. The identity of the deceased is yet to be released pending family notification.

title: Italy's Meloni vows to 'relaunch' cooperation with China
content: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni announced a three-year action plan to boost cooperation with China during her first official visit to Beijing. She aimed to rekindle trade ties after Italy's withdrawal from the Belt and Road Initiative last year. Key sectors for cooperation include electric mobility, renewables, and artificial intelligence. Meloni also addressed concerns over China's support for Russia.
summary: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni announced a three-year action plan to boost cooperation with China during her first official visit to Beijing. She aimed to rekindle trade ties after Italy's withdrawal from the Belt and Road Initiative last year. Key sectors for cooperation include electric mobility, renewables, and artificial intelligence. Meloni also addressed concerns over China's support for Russia.
